name: King Spider
text: When Revealed: Each player must choose and exhaust 1 character he controls.

name: Hummerhorns
text: Forced: After Hummerhorns engages a player, it deals 5 damage to a single hero controlled by that player.

name: Ungoliant's Spawn
text: When Revealed: Each player must raise his threat by 4 for each Spider card in play.

name: Forest Spider
text: Forced: After Forest Spider engages a player, it gets +1 [attack] until the end of the round.

name: Old Forest Road
text: Response: After Old Forest Road becomes the active location, the first player may choose and ready 1 character he controls.

name: Flies and Spiders
text: Setup: Search the encounter deck for 1 copy of Forest Spider and 1 copy of Old Forest Road, and add them to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.
